input: Manchester United take on Manchester City on Sunday . Match will begin at 4 pm local time at United 's Old Trafford home . Police have no objections to kick - off being so late in the afternoon . Last late afternoon weekend kick - off in the Manchester derby saw 34 fans arrested at Wembley in 2011 FA Cup semi - final .
targets: Manchester derby takes place at old trafford on sunday afternoon . Police have no objections to the late afternoon kick-off . Both sides are challenging for a top-four spot in the premier league . The man in charge of patrolling the sell-out clash has no such fears .

targets: Police say they have no objections to the 4pm kick-off for sunday 's manchester derby . Chief superintendent john o ` hare says the decision was agreed by all parties . Merseyside police launched a legal challenge after the everton v liverpool match was chosen for a 5.30 pm start . Fans in and close to the away end will be limited to two drinks every time they visit the bar . Police will also be searching supporters and keeping an eye out for pyrotechnics .
